name: Pass A Fist (KirbyC900)
description:
It's time to go home... one problem... there are a lot of mean people outside!

But you have giant fists so it should be fine... if you didn't have a curse. This curse makes it so all people are aggressive but if you punch them with those giant fists, then you die. Poof. Become non-existent.

Navigate your way home by hiding in telephone boxes, pushing items to block people's paths, or just straight up booking it.

W: Move Up

A: Move Left

S: Move Down

D: Move Right

Right-Click near objects and enemies to punch them (but remember your curse...)

Made for Pacifist Jam
